item.title: Crusade - 742 RuneScape Private Server
item.dc:creator: @megacrusader megacrusader
item.description:
@megacrusader wrote:

[SIZE=4]I been playing this server for a few weeks now, and the time I’ve spent playing Crusade, it really is one of the most enjoyable and fun rsps’s I’ve ever joined and played. It’s not the hardest server to make cash. The drops are perfectly proportioned, and dung system is great. You can vote and get a random barrows set, great for new players, or some cash to get you started. The custom mini game along with barrows is a great way to make cash. Skilling is really fun with the highscores and it’s fun to race other players to 99’s! Amazing updates are frequent and the owner is super friendly, he’s a great coder and knows his stuff! Overall the best thing about the server is, the community is fun to communicate with, the staff team is perfect, friendly and helpful. And great eco! I hope you join! Add me in-game “mega” can’t wait to see you!

Thanks to Yambar
[/SIZE]
Links:

Crusade - RuneScape Private Server
Crusade - Community
Crusade - Voting

Read full topic

item.title: Crusade - 742 RuneScape Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Yambar Yambar
item.description:
@Yambar wrote:

[quote=“Project-Storm, post:7, topic:550363”]Simple, straight to the point, some media, self explanatory, I’ve given this a try, neatly coded.
Neat advertisement, overall I think this is a professionalish server. Good job and keep up the work.[/quote][quote=“Soulcist, post:6, topic:550363”]You have a very simple advertisement but for some reason, to me - it’s appealing. And change the thread title, let’s be professional.[/quote][quote=“Stunninhigh, post:5, topic:550363”]Client takes ages to load…[/quote][quote=“tyb97, post:4, topic:550363”]Really shitty advertisement thread, JB’s review is the only thing that even turns me on a little to the server.[/quote][quote=“Justin Bieber, post:2, topic:550363”] (5 stars)

Overall, I found this a pretty decent server. The staff are friendly and considerate, but highly responsive and strict in the presence of spammers and hackers. There are plenty of skills to train in - I would personally recommend the Slayer skill. It has its roots in the core RuneScape functionality, with a perfect Crusade twist. The economy is well structured and I feel like it has grown naturally since the inception of this server, unlike other servers which are reasonable to begin with but experience significant market failure after a few weeks. The shops are also well organised, and I have always found the items I need at a reasonable price.[/quote]

Thank-you!

Read full topic

item.title: Crusade - 742 RuneScape Private Server
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

(5 stars)

Overall, I found this a pretty decent server. The staff are friendly and considerate, but highly responsive and strict in the presence of spammers and hackers. There are plenty of skills to train in - I would personally recommend the Slayer skill. It has its roots in the core RuneScape functionality, with a perfect Crusade twist. The economy is well structured and I feel like it has grown naturally since the inception of this server, unlike other servers which are reasonable to begin with but experience significant market failure after a few weeks. The shops are also well organised, and I have always found the items I need at a reasonable price.

Read full topic
